//
// Generated by Microsoft (R) HLSL Shader Compiler 9.29.952.3111
//
// Parameters:
//
//   float4 DNEResolution;
//   float4 DiffuseOverrideParameter;
//   float2 DistanceFadeParameters;
//   sampler2D LightAttenuationTexture;
//   float4 LightColorAndFalloffExponent;
//   float NvStereoEnabled;
//   sampler2D NvStereoFixTexture;
//   sampler2D PixelTexture2D_0;
//   float4 ScreenPositionScaleBias;
//   sampler2D ShadowWarpFunctionTexture;
//   bool bEnableDistanceShadowFading;
//   bool bReceiveDynamicShadows;
//
//
// Registers:
//
//   Name                         Reg   Size
//   ---------------------------- ----- ----
//   bReceiveDynamicShadows       b0       1
//   bEnableDistanceShadowFading  b1       1
//   DNEResolution                c0       1
//   ScreenPositionScaleBias      c1       1
//   NvStereoEnabled              c3       1
//   DiffuseOverrideParameter     c4       1
//   LightColorAndFalloffExponent c7       1
//   DistanceFadeParameters       c8       1
//   ShadowWarpFunctionTexture    s0       1
//   NvStereoFixTexture           s1       1
//   LightAttenuationTexture      s2       1
//   PixelTexture2D_0             s3       1
//

    ps_3_0
    def c2, 1, 0.5, -0.649999976, 0
    def c5, 0.0625, 0, 0, 0
    dcl_texcoord v0.xy
    dcl_texcoord7 v1
    dcl vPos.xy
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2
    dcl_2d s3

// Redundant Unreal Engine stereo correction disabled by DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --disable-redundant-unreal-correction --only-autofixed CRC32_17692AB1_166.txt
def c3, 0, 0, 0, 0 // Overrides NvStereoEnabled passed from Unreal Engine

    texld_pp r0, c2, s0
    texld r1, v0, s3
    add r1, r1.w, c2.z
    texkill r1
    if b0
      mad r0.yz, vPos.xxyw, c0.xxyw, c0.xzww
      mul r1.xy, r0.yzzw, v1.w
      if_ne c3.x, -c3.x
        texld r2, c5, s1
        add r0.y, -r2.y, v1.w
        mad r1.z, r2.x, r0.y, r1.x
        mov r1.xy, r1.zyzw
        mov r0.y, v1.w
      else
        mov r0.y, v1.w
      endif
      rcp r0.y, r0.y
      mul r0.yz, r0.y, r1.xxyw
      mad r0.yz, r0, c1.xxyw, c1.xwzw
      texld r1, r0.yzzw, s2
      mul_pp r0.yzw, r1.xxyz, r1.xxyz
      if b1
        dp3 r1.x, v1, v1
        rsq r1.x, r1.x
        rcp r1.x, r1.x
        add r1.x, -r1.x, c8.x
        mul_sat_pp r1.x, r1.x, c8.y
        mul_pp r1.x, r1.x, r1.x
        mad_pp r1.y, r1.w, r1.w, -r0.x
        mad_pp r1.xyz, r1.x, r1.y, r0.x
      else
        mov_pp r1.xyz, r0.x
      endif
      mul_pp r0.yzw, r0, r1.xxyz
    else
      mov_pp r0.yzw, r0.x
    endif
    mul r0.xyz, r0.yzww, c4
    mul oC0.xyz, r0, c7
    mov oC0.w, c2.w

// approximately 46 instruction slots used (4 texture, 42 arithmetic)
